content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (22.5, -7.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (22.5, -7.5)
- Boiler at position (20.5, -4.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (19.5, -1.5)
- Pipe network connecting these entities, including positions such as (20.5, -10.5), (21.5, -10.5), (22.5, -10.5), (24.5, -10.5), (20.5, -8.5), (20.5, -9.5), (24.5, -9.5), (20.5, -7.5), (20.5, -5.5), (23.5, -4.5), (22.5, -4.5), (24.5, -5.5), (24.5, -4.5)
- Small Electric Pole at position (24.5, -7.5)

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)

### Copper Plate Production Facility
Consists of:
- Stone Furnace at position (2.0, 0.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (5.0, 5.0)

### Pipe Networks
- PipeGroup for steam at position (19.5, -12.5)
- PipeGroup for water at position (4.5, -9.5)
- PipeGroup for water at position (19.5, -2.5)

### Electricity Network
- ElectricityGroup with poles at positions such as (21.5, -14.5), (23.5, -12.5), (10.5, -10.5), (25.5, -10.5), (10.5, -6.5), (24.5, -7.5)

### Research Facility
- Lab working on electronics with input of automation science packs

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing
